label: Environmental Conservation
description: Efforts to protect and preserve the natural environment and its resources.

subcategories.label: Climate Change
subcategories.description: The long-term alteration of global weather patterns caused by human activity.

subcategories.label: Endangered Species
subcategories.description: Animals and plants at risk of extinction due to habitat loss, poaching, and other factors.

subcategories.label: Eco-Friendly Products
subcategories.description: Products that are designed to have minimal impact on the environment.

subcategories.label: Rainforest Conservation
subcategories.description: Efforts to protect and preserve rainforests and their ecosystems.

subcategories.label: Water Conservation
subcategories.description: Efforts to reduce water waste and preserve water resources.
